mapper.select: update INSBAds set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},agreementid = #{agreementid},name = #{name},title = #{title},description = #{description},adscreateTime = #{adscreateTime},startTime = #{startTime},endTime = #{endTime},status = #{status} where id = #{id}
